translations: 对流式暖房器；对流散热器；[建] 换流器

sentences.sentence: Silicon controlled static frequency convectors are used as medium frequency power source for this series of furnaces.
sentences.translation: 本系列电炉采用可控硅静止变频为中频电源进行感应加热。

sentences.sentence: Consumer goods production - "Krom" electric convectors, "Luch" electric radiators, "Pskova" electric stoves, electric water heaters, wash stands, etc.
sentences.translation: 消费品生产——“Krom”电对流散热器、“Luch”电散热器、“Pskova”电炉、电热水器、清洗台等。
